# `enumerate` for [filters](/commands/categories/filters.md)

<div class='command-title'>Enumerate the elements in a stream.</div>

## Signature

```> enumerate {flags} ```


## Input/output types:

| input | output |
| ----- | ------ |
| any   | table  |

## Examples

Add an index to each element of a list
```nu
> [a, b, c] | enumerate
╭───┬──────╮
│ # │ item │
├───┼──────┤
│ 0 │ a    │
│ 1 │ b    │
│ 2 │ c    │
╰───┴──────╯

```
